feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: The context is a message posted by Matt Corallo on the Bitcoin Github repository. He announces that Wallet Encryption has been rebased onto the wallet class and is now ready for "wtf is this crap" messages. A link to the pull request can be found in the message. Later, Matt sends another message stating that the Wallet Encryption is now pull-able and requests final comments/ACKs from other contributors. The messages are accompanied by two signature.asc attachments.
